00216 class EGS_IPLANES_EXPORT EGS_RadialRepeater : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00217 
00218 public:
00219 
00220     EGS_RadialRepeater(const EGS_Vector &Xo, const EGS_Vector &A, int np,
00221             EGS_BaseGeometry *G, EGS_Float first=0, const string &Name = "");
00222 
00223     ~EGS_RadialRepeater();
00224 
00225     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return true; };
00226 
00227     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00228         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00229         //EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir];
00230         EGS_Vector xp = (x-xo)*R[ir];
00231         int il = g->isWhere(xp);
00232         return il >= 0 ? ir*ng + il : nreg-1;
00233     };
00234 
00235     int medium(int ireg) const {
00236         if( ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg ) return -1;
00237         if( ireg == nreg-1 ) return med;
00238         int ir = ireg/ng; int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00239         return g->medium(il);
00240     };
00241 
00242     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00243 
00244     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00245                EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00246         if( ireg < 0 ) {
00247             egsFatal("\nEGS_RadialRepeater::howfar: position can not"
00248                " be outside\n"); return ireg;
00249         }
00250         //egsWarning("\nhowfar(ir=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) u=(%g,%g,%g) t=%g)\n",
00251         //        ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z,t);
00252         if( ireg < nreg-1 ) { // in the repeated geometry
00253             int ir = ireg/ng; int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00254             //EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00255             EGS_Vector xp = (x-xo)*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00256             //egsWarning("In repetition %d: xp=(%g,%g,%g) up=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00257             //      ir,xp.x,xp.y,xp.z,up.x,up.y,up.z);
00258             int inew = g->howfar(il,xp,up,t,newmed,normal);
00259             //egsWarning("il=%d inew=%d t=%d\n",il,inew,t);
00260             if( inew < 0 ) {
00261                 if( normal ) *normal = R[ir]*(*normal);
00262                 inew = nreg-1; if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00263             }
00264             else inew += ir*ng;
00265             return inew;
00266         }
00267         // outside of the replicas
00268         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00269         //egsWarning("outside repetions, ir=%d\n",ir);
00270         EGS_Float t_left = t; EGS_Vector xtmp(x);
00271         EGS_Float ttot = 0;
00272         //EGS_Vector tmp_n;
00273         //EGS_Vector *norm = normal ? &tmp_n : 0;
00274         while(1) {
00275             EGS_Float this_t = t_left;
00276             //EGS_Vector xp = xtmp*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00277             EGS_Vector xp = (xtmp-xo)*R[ir], up = u*R[ir];
00278             //egsWarning("xtmp=(%g,%g,%g)\n",xtmp.x,xtmp.y,xtmp.z);
00279             //egsWarning("xp=(%g,%g,%g) up=(%g,%g,%g)\n",xp.x,xp.y,xp.z,up.x,up.y,up.z);
00280             int inew = g->howfar(-1,xp,up,this_t,newmed,normal);
00281             //egsWarning("inew=%d t=%g\n",inew,this_t);
00282             if( inew >= 0 ) {
00283                 t = ttot + this_t;
00284                 if( normal ) *normal = R[ir]*(*normal);
00285                 return ir*ng + inew;
00286             }
00287             int next_ir = iplanes->howfar(ir,xtmp,u,this_t,0,0);
00288             //egsWarning("next sector: %d t=%g\n",next_ir,this_t);
00289             if( next_ir == ir ) return ireg;
00290             ttot += this_t; t_left -= this_t; xtmp += u*this_t;
00291             ir = next_ir;
00292         }
00293     };
00294 
00295     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00296         if( ireg < 0 ) {
00297             egsFatal("EGS_RadialRepeater::hownear: position can not"
00298                     " be outside\n"); return 0;
00299         }
00300         if( ireg < nreg-1 ) { // in the repeated geometry
00301             int ir = ireg/ng; int il = ireg - ir*ng;
00302             EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir]; return g->hownear(il,xp);
00303         }
00304         // outside of the replicas
00305         int ir = iplanes->isWhere(x);
00306         EGS_Vector xp = x*R[ir];
00307         return g->hownear(-1,xp);
00308     };
00309 
00310     int getMaxStep() const {
00311         return nrep*(g->getMaxStep() + 1);
00312     };
00313 
00314     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00315 
00316     void printInfo() const;
00317 
00318     void setRLabels (EGS_Input *input);
00319     virtual void getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00320 
00321 protected:
00322 
00323     EGS_IPlanes        *iplanes;
00324     EGS_BaseGeometry   *g;
00325     EGS_RotationMatrix *R;
00326 
00327     EGS_Vector         xo;
00328 
00329     int                nrep, ng;
00330     EGS_Float          phi_o;
00331 
00332     static string      type;
00333 
00334 
00335 };
00336 
00337 
00338 #endif
